timeline.message: Merge branch 'dev' of https://github.com/reichg/atlas-checks into acuteAngleBuildingCheck
False Positive Phase. Added node range for buildings
all necessary documentation as well as unit tests complete. Awaiting FPR analysis from editors.
adjusting angle range after first round of FPR analysis.

timeline.bodyText: It would be nice to have a unit test or two for the angleCounts configurable.
timeline.author: Bentleysb

timeline.message: Added tests for number of angles per suggested comment!

timeline.bodyText: I think we may run into a situation where the vertex of 2 segments contains 2 nodes --1 node belonging to the meeting segments and another stray node which would be a Segment of length 0. So there's actually 3 segments all connected. We could log something so it's clear why we're skipping this kind of polygon
timeline.author: seancoulter
